name: theme
description: Complete theme system for PayloadCMS with shadcn/ui integration, color presets, and live preview
author: PayloadKit
features: 4 built-in theme presets (Default, Zinc, Slate, New York)
Live theme preview in PayloadCMS admin
usage: Import Theme global configuration and add to your PayloadCMS globals array. Use ThemeProvider in your React app to apply theme.

installation: Add Theme to your globals configuration
setup.cssIntegration: The theme system automatically generates CSS variables compatible with shadcn/ui. Include the generated CSS in your application.
